heisigStory: It is best to see this kanji as a pictograph of a revolving circular clothesline (viewed from the side). Spin it around quickly in your mind's eye to give it the connotation of to dry.
koohiiStory1: Dry one item in ten minutes on the clothesline.
koohiiStory2: Note: the book shows the strokes for potato rather than dry...dry does not have the hook at the end.
readingExamples: 干る (ひ.る), 干す (ほ.す)
words: to air, dry, desiccate, drain (off), drink up
